channel.title: Emacs on Kyo91 - A Programmer's Tale
channel.description: Recent content in Emacs on Kyo91 - A Programmer's Tale

item.title: Elasticsearch Requests from Emacs
item.description: Lately, I’ve found myself working with Elasticsearch’s JSON API and being disappointed with the state of api request tools. While many offer some neat functionalities, none of them are as easy to navigate as Emacs. Additionally, all I’ve seen require typing into different text fields for say the URL resource versus the body text (on that note many clients seem to have limited support for bodies on a GET request, albeit I’ve never seen an API besides ES’s to use that feature).
